page.title: 01SYNOPSIS
page.content: THIS AREA IS AN{AGRICULTURAL AREA}WITH A LARGE NUMBER OF{FOREST}STANDS. THE VILLAGES OF HORSFORD AND FELTHORPE LAY WITHIN THE GRID SQUARES, AND WHILE BEING OLD TRADITIONAL FARMING COMMUNITIES THEY HAVE ALTERED IN NATURE WITH THE GROWTH OF MOTOR CAR OWNERSHIP. HORSFORD ESPECIALLY, IS NOW A {DORMITORY SETTLEMENT}FOR NORWICH.MOST PEOPLE OWN A CAR AND WORK OUTSIDE THE AREA. THERE IS VERY LITTLE INDUSTRY INSIDE THE AREA AND PEOPLE ARE FORCED TO COMMUTE. THE NATURAL ECOSYSTEMS OF THE AREA ARE GREATLY ALTERED AND{MAN}CONTINUES TO {MANIPULATE THE ENVIRONMENT}FOR HIS OWN NEEDS. PEOPLE ENJOY LIVING IN THE AREA, CREATING THEIR OWN LEISURE ACTIVITIES, PARTICIPATING IN LOCAL EVENTS AND CONTRIBUTING TO{MODERN VILLAGE LIFE.
